title: Fully Furnished North Berkeley Duplex - Laundry In Unit!
posting_body: VIDEO TOUR -------COPY AND PASTE-------   <URL>
To be considered for this house, please do tell us a bit about yourself, and watch the video tour in advance.
Feel free to ask any questions and thanks for checking out this listing!
Address: 1385 Neilson St, Berkeley
Rent: $4500
Deposit: $8000
Move In:
Available
By: August, 15th 2022
Utilities by owner: Landlord pays garbage pick up and WiFi
Utilities by tenant: electicity, gas and water - Unit does have solar panels - reducing costs!
Well qualified tenants will have: Positive rental history, 3x the rent in verifiable income and solid credit.
1385 Neilson St Berkeley Fully furnished and super comfortable duplex in desirable North Berkeley with laundry in unit.
3 bedrooms 1 bath with split level master bedroom on the 2nd floor of the house.
Unit features beautiful fresh paint, fixtures and updated cosmetic details throughout.
kitchen has gas range, full size stainless fridge.
Includes microwave.
Large double sink, kitchen also has sliding door to outside walkway, ceiling features skylight and there are a plentiful amount cabinets.
Full size washer and dryer included as well.
Central heating system works wonderfully.
Each room is Furnished with all essentials, with bed and desk and living room includes television.
Located in North Berkeley just a few blocks to the natural grocery store, cafe, beer garden and easy walk to north Berkeley Bart.
Parking is free and abundant but does require moving car once per month for street sweeping at posted times.
Well qualified renters will have 3x the rent in income combined.
Landlord is not renting this house by the room, it is one lease for the whole house.
(Sorry we won’t rent this house unfurnished).
Equal opportunity housing.
